keyMoments.title: Kodama's Debut
keyMoments.description: Kodama meets Usopp at her grandfather's workshop and compliments his firework craftsmanship, showing genuine appreciation where her grandfather saw only mediocrity.
keyMoments.significance: First introduction to a young pyrotechnician who will learn an important lesson about legacy and dreams.

keyMoments.title: Reveals Parents' Tragic Death
keyMoments.description: Kodama reveals to Usopp that her parents died one year ago while attempting to launch the Ball 205 firework due to flawed equipment.
keyMoments.significance: Provides the emotional foundation for the episode and explains Kodama's dangerous determination.
keyMoments.quote: A year ago, they tried to fire a similarly huge firework, but the equipment was flawed and there was an accident which killed both of my parents.

keyMoments.title: Learns True Meaning of Her Parents' Dream
keyMoments.description: At the cemetery, Usopp helps Kodama realize that she herself is her parents' true dream - not the firework, but her future as a master pyrotechnician and carrier of the family tradition.
keyMoments.significance: The turning point of Kodama's character arc where she matures and understands what truly matters.

relationships.description: Odama is Kodama's grandfather who raised her after her parents' death. Despite his stern exterior, he deeply cares for her safety.

evolutionMoments.description: Their relationship is tested when Odama forbids the dangerous firework launch, but ultimately strengthens when they complete it together safely.

relationships.description: Usopp befriends Kodama and serves as a mentor figure, teaching her about the true meaning of her parents' dream and helping her achieve it safely.

evolutionMoments.description: Kodama quickly trusts Usopp and confides her plans to him. He becomes instrumental in helping her honor her parents while staying safe.

reveals.information: Parents died in a firework launch accident one year ago
Apprentice pyrotechnician learning from her grandfather

keyMoments.title: Odama's Debut
keyMoments.description: Odama meets Usopp and immediately dismisses him as a novice firework maker, refusing to help on the busy festival day.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces a stern master craftsman who guards his family's traditions fiercely.
keyMoments.quote: I have no time for a novice firework maker like you, especially on the day of the festival!

keyMoments.title: Forbids Dangerous Launch
keyMoments.description: After learning of Kodama's plan to launch the Ball 205, Odama strictly forbids it out of fear of losing his granddaughter as he lost her parents.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Odama's protective nature and the conflict between honoring tradition and ensuring safety.

keyMoments.title: Successfully Launches Ball 205
keyMoments.description: Using Usopp's pulley system and the ancient launch platform, Odama helps launch the massive firework safely, honoring his family's 400-year tradition.
keyMoments.significance: Represents Odama learning to trust others and finding a way to honor tradition safely.

abilities.description: Master-level skills in creating and launching fireworks, maintaining a 400-year family tradition.

relationships.description: Odama is Kodama's grandfather who became her sole guardian after her parents died. He is protective and strict but loves her deeply.

evolutionMoments.description: Their relationship is tested when Odama must balance protecting Kodama with honoring family tradition, ultimately finding a safe solution with Usopp's help.

relationships.description: Initially dismissive of Usopp, Odama gains respect for the pirate after witnessing his technical skills and wisdom.

evolutionMoments.description: Odama's attitude shifts from dismissive to respectful as Usopp proves his worth as a craftsman and helps solve the firework launch problem.

reveals.information: Lost his daughter and son-in-law in a firework accident one year ago

keyMoments.title: Wise Counsel at the Cemetery
keyMoments.description: Usopp demonstrates emotional maturity by helping Kodama understand that she is her parents' true dream, not the firework itself.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Usopp's depth beyond his usual comedic cowardice, revealing genuine wisdom and compassion.
keyMoments.quote: Your parents' dream is not just about launching a 200-gauge shell. You are their dream. Their dream is that you carry on the family tradition and become a master pyrotechnist.

keyMoments.title: Devises Pulley System Solution
keyMoments.description: Usopp creates an ingenious pulley system to safely transport and launch the Ball 205, solving the technical problem that caused the fatal accident.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Usopp's inventive genius and problem-solving abilities as the crew's craftsman.

abilities.description: Designs and implements mechanical solutions like the pulley system for the Ball 205 launch.

reveals.information: Shows emotional depth and wisdom beyond his usual cowardly persona
